item.title: bley 0.1.5 released
item.dc:creator: Evgeni Golov
item.description: I've just released bley 0.1.5! This release includes another MySQL fix (people, really, use PostgreSQL!), a manpage and now properly detects UsEr@EXamPLe.cOM as user@example.com.

item.title: bley 0.1.4 released
item.dc:creator: Evgeni Golov
item.description: I've just released bley 0.1.4! It includes two small fixes that should make it even more stable (1: reconnect to a dead database, 2: strip non-ascii chars).

item.title: bley 0.1.2 released
item.dc:creator: Evgeni Golov
item.description: I've just released bley 0.1.2! 0.1.1 behaved wrongly in some setups in regard to RBLs (twisted-names is needed again).

item.title: bley 0.1.1 accepted to Debian
item.dc:creator: Evgeni Golov
item.description:
Today, bley was accepted to Debian.
If you are running unstable (sid), you now can "apt-get install bley" and enjoy! Ubuntu Maverick should follow soon, and I hope to be able to provide backports for Lenny and older Ubuntus too.

item.title: bley 0.1.1 uploaded to Debian
item.dc:creator: Evgeni Golov
item.description:
Uploading to ftp-master (via ftp to ftp.upload.debian.org):
Uploading bley_0.1.1-1.dsc: done.
Uploading bley_0.1.1.orig.tar.gz: done.
Uploading bley_0.1.1-1.debian.tar.gz: done.
Uploading bley_0.1.1-1_all.deb: done.
Uploading bley_0.1.1-1_amd64.changes: done.
This means: bley was just uploaded to Debian. It's currently in the NEW queue, but I hope it will hit the archive very soon :)
I'll post the .deb under download in a couple of minutes.

item.title: bley 0.1.1 released
item.dc:creator: Evgeni Golov
item.description: I've just released bley 0.1.1! 0.1 had severe problems with MySQL.
